paragraph: Greg Droman is an American record producer, mixing and audio engineer. He has made hit singles and albums for some of the biggest artists in pop, rock, and country music. He has been Grammy and ACM nominated, winning an CMA as producer for Album of the Year. He is married with singer and songwriter Marilyn Martin, for whom he produced and mixed her latest album, Trust, Love, Pray.
